thread.title: LINKSrechts Turnkey LED Lighting Solutions for Naval Applications
thread.title_full: LINKSrechts Turnkey LED Lighting Solutions for Naval Applications

title: LINKSrechts Turnkey LED Lighting Solutions for Naval Applications
text:
LINKSrechts Turnkey LED Lighting Solutions for Naval Applications 29 September 2015 by LINKSrechts Print Email Company Details 
LINKSrechts is a German company specialised in the delivery of LED lighting turnkey solutions. 
The Advanced Naval lighting system enables LINKSrechts to provide shipyards with a highly automatised, highly efficient lighting system, with extremely low-weight and power consumption, due to its high-end modular system. 
Download the free brochure for more information. Available Downloads
